changes.note: Dependencies updated
Dependencies updated
Upgrade web3-provider-engine to 14.0.4
Relax `to` validation in base wallet subprovider for transactions that deploy contracts
Refactor RedundantRPCSubprovider into RedundantSubprovider where it now accepts an array of subproviders rather then an array of RPC endpoints
Add PrivateKeySubprovider and refactor shared functionality into a base wallet subprovider
Add MnemonicWalletsubprovider, deprecating our truffle-hdwallet-provider fork
Support multiple addresses in ledger and mnemonic wallets
Refactors LedgerSubprovider such that explicitly setting the `pathIndex` is no longer required. Simply set the request `from` address as desired
Renamed derivationPath to baseDerivationPath.
Dependencies updated
Introduce `JSONRPCRequestPayloadWithMethod` type
Export `ErrorCallback` type.
Export `GanacheSubprovider` and `Subprovider`
Make all subproviders to derive from `Subprovider`
Add types for `NextCallback`, `OnNextCompleted`
Ignore `ganache-core` dependency when using package in a browser environment.
Updated legerco packages. Removed node-hid package as a dependency and make it an optional dependency. It is still used in integration tests but is causing problems for users on Linux distros.
Move web3 types from being a devDep to a dep since one cannot use this package without it
Add `numberOfAccounts` param to `LedgerSubprovider` method `getAccountsAsync`
Add EmptyWalletSubprovider and FakeGasEstimateSubprovider
Fix publishing issue where .npmignore was not properly excluding undesired content
Added NonceTrackerSubprovider
InjectedWeb3Subprovider accepts a Provider in the constructor, previously it was a Web3 object
Return a transaction hash from `_sendTransactionAsync`
Allow LedgerSubprovider to handle `eth_sign` in addition to `personal_sign` RPC requests
Improve the performance of address fetching
